markdownRemark.excerpt: Yes . You can change warning and error ranges for all variables that have numeric display type: number, base or percent. Variables with display type strings hasâ€¦
markdownRemark.html: Yes. You can change warning and error ranges for all variables that have numeric display type: number, base or percent. Variables with display type strings has no such ranges.

frontmatter.title: Can I change warn and error ranges?
How the display types string, number, base and percent are different?
